items.title: Already Pardoned by Trump, Jan. 6 Rioters Push for Compensation
items.description: One of the rioters’ lawyers wants to create a panel that would decide on financial damages for what the rioters believe were unfair prosecutions.

items.title: Robert Mueller Has Parkinson’s Disease, Family Says
items.description: The former special counsel, who led the Russia investigation during President Trump’s first term, has had difficulty speaking in recent months. A cong...

items.title: Trump Crime Strategy May Work for Now, but Not for Long, Experts Say
items.description: The president is looking to add troops to city streets while cutting funds for programs that work, experts and local officials say. But one idea, beau...

items.title: Rudy Giuliani Is Hurt in Car Crash in New Hampshire
items.description: Mr. Giuliani, the former New York City mayor and lawyer for President Trump, suffered a fractured vertebra, his head of security said.

items.title: U.S. Suspends Visas for Palestinian Passport Holders, Officials Say
items.description: The move will stop, at least temporarily, travel for medical treatment, attending university, visiting relatives or conducting business.
